Params: {3: 'When the last petal falls from the rose, the curse will take effect.'}
{3: 'As the final petal withers away, the Demon Lord and everything within the castle will fade into nothingness.'}
{3: 'Rose petals now carpet the floor, and the countdown has begun.'}
{3: 'This time, the villagers\' wish will finally come true—for the "Demon Lord" has made contact with the shadows, hastening this countdown.'}
{3: 'When the midnight bells toll, the Demon Lord who has struggled on Earth for hundreds of years will finally perish.'}
{3: 'The Demon Lord sits in a chair, gently toying with the withering rose.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The rose brought by that puppet will soon vanish too... What a pity there's only this one.", 18: '100009462'}
{3: 'The puppet "hero" who suddenly appeared in the castle has long since departed, their brief time together like a beautiful dream she had not experienced in ages.'}
{3: 'She still remembers when the puppet handed her the rose, with that familiar hesitation written across its face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You dare to give me something like this... Was it truly unintentional?', 4: '1', 18: '100009463'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Did my subordinates not tell you what "roses" mean to me?', 4: '1', 18: '100009464'}
{3: 'But that puppet—with the same look as the human—replied:'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Hah, how thoroughly prepared. Did they even fabricate identical memories? To think you could say those exact words.', 18: '100009465'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But regrettably, even a puppet so uncannily similar, I won't keep it by my side.", 18: '100009466'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I've always wanted that person to find their way to somewhere more vast and free.", 18: '100009467'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Alright, you persistent "system" that keeps watching me, you can piss off now.', 18: '100009468'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You\'ve gotten what you wanted. Your precious "hero" has been sent beyond the shadows by me and will likely return safely to your village soon enough.', 18: '100009469'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "As for me... in these final moments before the Punishing Virus devours me, I'd like to be alone.", 18: '100009470'}
{3: 'She brings the rose gifted by the puppet to her lips, savoring the soft, moist texture of its petals.'}
{3: "Invisible shadows have begun to corrupt her fingertips. Soon, humanity's final stronghold—the Demon Lord's castle—will also be engulfed in darkness."}
{3: 'She quietly surveys the great hall bathed in moonlight. If only, she thinks, beautiful dance music could fill this space.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Ah, thinking about it now, it's somewhat regrettable. Had I known better, I wouldn't have said so much to that puppet so soon.", 18: '100009471'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If I'd kept the puppet in the attic, perhaps I could have found some other amusements before everything ends.", 18: '100009472'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Forget it. Let's toast to everything that's about to disappear.", 18: '100009473'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'To the last castle, to the "Rose Curse" coveted for centuries, and—', 18: '100009474'}
{3: 'Vera raises her glass, the bright red liquid gently swirling within.'}
{3: 'She glances at the clock hands approaching midnight, then drains her glass in one go.'}
{3: 'But before the midnight bell can toll, a knock at the door shatters the silence of the long night.'}
{3: 'The crisp sound cuts through the howling blizzard, like the first ray of dawn piercing the lonely darkness.'}
{3: 'Vera glances toward the source of the sound, but only offers a self-mocking smile in response.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Heh, what am I even hoping for at this point... Has the Punishing Virus concentration risen high enough to cause hallucinations?', 18: '100009476'}
{3: 'But the door swings wide open—and she suddenly realizes this is no hallucination.'}
{3: "The blizzard sweeps up rose petals from the floor, obscuring the human's face and making it impossible for her to read their expression."}
{3: "The human's snow-covered steps slowly approach her—with a noticeable limp."}
{3: 'The "system" in your head shrieks so loudly it nearly blows your skull apart—the surviving "humans" seem furious and shocked that their fabricated puppet has gone haywire.'}
{2: '(Just... bear with it... a little longer...)', 3: '176'}
{3: "The protagonist of this hero's tale approaches the Demon Lord, step by step, despite their opposing sides."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This place will be devoured by the "New World" in no time. Do you really want to stand against the "villagers" who worship you?', 18: '100009478'}
{3: 'Whether in reality or illusion, the human\'s "soul" never wants a story to reach a regretful ending.'}
{2: "I've heard... that when the moonlight is at its finest, they hold balls in the castle,", 3: '194'}
{2: 'I still remember the way back to the castle.', 3: '195'}
{2: 'I have no gown, nor an invitation,', 3: '196'}
{3: 'The human staggers, nearly falling to their knees—but manages to stay upright—using the "village\'s finest sword" for support.'}
{2: 'I still wish to be your dance partner.', 3: '202'}
{2: 'Right now, I am not a puppet fabricated by Punishing,', 3: '204'}
{2: 'much less a phantom long lost in the past.', 3: '206'}
{2: 'I bet this is still just a script, and a better world exists beyond.', 3: '208'}
{2: 'When the bell tolls its last, come with me to the [Good Ending].', 3: '209'}
{3: 'The human extends a hand to Vera, the only warmth in a world full of swirling snow.'}
{3: 'There is not a trace of hesitation in their eyes, only a hopeful question, as if this were merely an ordinary ball, and they were extending a polite invitation to a dance partner.'}
{2: 'May I have the honor... of dancing with you until the clock strikes?', 3: '232'}
{3: 'After a long silence, she finally responds to the hand extended toward her.'}
{3: 'As their fingers intertwine, she feels the warmth emanating from that hand.'}
{3: 'The light casts their silhouettes against the wall, and watching the flickering shadows, she realizes just how close they are to each other.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You haven't changed at all. You're exactly the same as when I first saw you.", 18: '100009481'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You really are... a naive and stubborn fool.', 18: '100009482'}
{3: "She places her hands on the human's shoulder and waist, her face lighting up with a radiant smile."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If you want to be my dance partner, you'll have to follow my lead. Can you keep up?", 18: '100009483'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's dance together... until the very last moment.", 18: '100009485'}
{3: 'The music begins, echoing across the floor bathed in moonlight, as the lunar glow through the windows illuminates their silhouettes.'}
{3: 'A tale that should have reached its ending now begins to be rewritten anew in this moment.'}
